about:
Hi there! I'm Chad Banghart, a software engineer based in Los Angeles, with a knack for troubleshooting, creative problem-solving, and a keen eye for detail. I thrive on tackling complex challenges and turning them into seamless, user-friendly solutions.


From developing dynamic web applications to searching out the peskiest of bugs, I love every aspect of software engineering. My journey serving Tech and Camera departments in the film industry has equipped me with a versatile skill set, giving me the tools to succeed in my path to Software Engineering.

What truly drives me is the opportunity to collaborate with talented teams and bring innovative ideas to life. Whether it's optimizing a piece of code, enhancing user experience, or ensuring a project runs smoothly from start to finish, I approach each task with enthusiasm and precision.

When I'm not coding, you might find me exploring the latest tech trends, tinkering with new frameworks, or finding ways to improve my pet chickens lives. I believe in continuous learning and enjoy staying updated with the ever-evolving tech landscape.

Let's connect and create something amazing together!
